definition: circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
to melt/to thaw/to blend/to merge/to be in harmony

sentences.english: Different from ordinary societies, the Dao root of communism has the constant Dao property of perfect fusion.
sentences.chinese: 共产道根具有常道的圆融性质，与一般社会不同。

sentences.english: The philosophy of perfect interfusion, put forward by Chih-i, the de-facto founder of Tiantai Sect, is the basis of Tiantai Buddhism.
sentences.chinese: 天台智𫖮的圆融哲学思想体系是奠定天台佛学的基础。

definition: to understand/to comprehend the ultimate essence of things (Buddhism)
amiable (manner)/unassuming/written in plain language/easy to take in
Buddha-like heart (full of compassion)/spirit of Buddha (awakened to reality and no longer clinging to appearances)
to stand aloof/to be detached from/to transcend worldliness/untrammeled/unconventional
